content: Yes, during the "Picking up the bride" ceremony in Guangxi, the groom and his groomsmen have to overcome various challenges and obstacles to reach the bride's home and take her to the wedding venue. Traditionally, the groom has to perform several tasks to prove his worthiness to marry the bride. The challenges may include puzzles, riddles, or physical obstacles, such as passing through a gate decorated with flowers or breaking through a series of barriers. The bride's family may also play pranks on the groom's party, like pretending to give them the wrong address or demanding exorbitant amounts of money before allowing them to enter the home. Once the challenges are completed, the groom and his groomsmen can finally bring the bride to the wedding venue.
